answers.answer: I just found your post, and was wondering if you ever found out what was causing your earaches ? I have Type-2 Diabetes too, and sometimes my blood pressure is not as good as it should be.And I have been having a lot of earaches recently, myself. And I've had Autonomic Neuropathy for 4 years, before I was diagnosed wit Diabetes.

question: I have Diabetes Type 2 and have high BP. At the moment I'm having awful dizziness,just moving my head slightly is really wierd.Since Tuesday I've had earache,unusual for me and its just like it is when your jaw locks,eating ,yawning hurts my jaw.No cold or sore throat just generally feel off earache feeling a bit better today but dizziness is horrible.Wondering if its anything to do with the Autonomic Neuropathy caused by the Diabetes.Glad for any suggestions,can't get Docs appointment till next wednesday!receptionist just said to go to A&E if it gets worse!!
title: Dizziness and Earache
